SEARCH
Package pieces

Class Piece

java.lang.Object
pieces.Piece
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class Piece extends Object implements Cloneable
This is the Piece Class. It is an abstract class from which all the actual pieces are inherited. It defines all the function common to all the pieces The move() function an abstract function that has to be overridden in all the inherited class It implements Cloneable interface as a copy of the piece is required very often
Since:
JDK 7
See Also:
